website_summaries.verdict: The LG 34UM95 is a beautifully crafted and very expensive 34-inch ultra-wide Quad-HD monitor that lets you split its massive screen into four custom-sized sections. I/O ports are plentiful, and viewing angles are wide, but this monitor's color accuracy and dark gray-scale performance could be better.
cons: Middling color accuracy and gray-scale performance

customer_reviews.title: Was great for 5 years, then died.
customer_reviews.text: Had this monitor for a little over 5 years and loved it. It finally died this year, just over 5 years of nearly daily use for 10-12 hours a day (work from home). Now it simply won't power on. I was mad till I saw I had it for 5 years. Still, I would have liked to have seen 7-8 years of life out of it. I loved the form-factor so much, I've just replaced it with a 49 inch model from Dell.
customer_reviews.author: lordhamster

customer_reviews.title: Great value, superb display for software development
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to be the primary display for my Mac Pro (you know, the one that looks like Darth Vader and a trash can got brownchickenbrowncow?). With the built in thunderbolt, you really can see the display quality difference, even over HDMI which I've really been happy with on my ... way too many other computers. I write a lot of code, so perfection of the display with no fuzziness in the text is crucial. I have found that for me, LG/Samsung just has awesome display properties. I'm phasing this in as my primary Mac system, and this display is well worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: Bill D

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  And it works as advertised on a late 2011 iMac
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I just hooked it up and at this point want to make one additional comment about the monitor. The box the monitor came in and I am sure the literature also says that this monitor is "comparable with only the Mac Pro" other reviewers have had success with newer iMacs. My iMac is late 2011 and the About this Mac window has: " LG ULTRAWIDE Display 34-inch (3440 x 1440) AMD Radeon HD 6770M 512 MB graphics" so i am really amazed that the resolution is as advertised. I will update this review after I have used the monitor for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Mathman

customer_reviews.title: Great 2nd monitor and I'm using it along side the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great 2nd monitor and I'm using it along side the iMac 27". There is a lot of room on this monitor for lots of open windows. I use it as the main monitor when running FCP as it is really nice having large video monitors and timeline whilst editing. You can drag any window to and from as needed. You need only to install the split screen applet on your Mac and the rest is configured in system preferences. Very happy with it and it is "wide"! It was a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: beav

customer_reviews.title: Mostly Just Great!
customer_reviews.text: After trying many other wide monitors, I am now selling my Thunderbolt Display. The 34UM95 has a matt screen is very light but greatly reduces glare, (I work in a very sunny room)... and the extra screen real estate makes two monitors unnecessary... With Windows an HDMI will get you a fine crisp desktop, with a Macbook Pro, it really shines in performance. With Windows I was unable to use the Display Port connection perhaps something in the BIOS needs to be adjusted. A direct HDMI to HDMI failed as well. Only with a DVI to HDMI Adapter did I get a screen desktop but it does look great...
customer_reviews.author: Confuzed Win User

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up plus all my fingers and toes...
customer_reviews.text: I've seen reviews from users who have had to return theirs due to light leaks and other manufacturing flaws, but I have no complaints that would warrant returning it. On a pure black screen, the back light is not even. It displays a reverse vignette, but in actual use, this monitor is beautiful. I'm using it in a gaming build. For those curious about gaming on this, I'm currently driving it with a pair of R9 270x cards, and I'm able to run most of my games on high or ultra, but I plan to upgrade to 290's to push even more through to the monitor, (and to get reasonable performance from games that don't play well in xfire.)
customer_reviews.author: Ivory

customer_reviews.title: Great for software developers
customer_reviews.text: I debated on whether to get this or a 4K monitor. I'm glad I chose this display. In the past, my workflow has relied on having my windows fullscreen and tabbing between them, however this monitor has enabled me to comfortably use windows spread around the screen. As a software developer this monitor is perfect for having multiple files open at once (I can comfortably have five vertical Vim splits open at a time).
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Morgan

customer_reviews.title: My All Time Favorite Display
customer_reviews.text: I totally love everything about this display. The colors and crispness of the display are the best of any I've owned. Gaming is extremely improved. The width allows me to have my Windows PC and MacBook opened on a single screen, side by side, freeing up desk space by eliminating the monitor and speakers that were connected to my MacBook (everything now connects and runs thru this display). Honestly, it's exactly what I've wished for, and not found until now. I can't imagine how to improve the experience in a future display. In summary, the experience leads to a mental illusion that I now have two shiny new computers. Two thumbs up!!!
customer_reviews.author: CoachRHD

customer_reviews.title: Amazing... worth it... a thing of beauty
customer_reviews.text: Such a beauty.... when I walk into my office, I look at this, and see three chrome browsers open, all next to each other, all beautiful... like I have three monitors... then BAM! - I open a 4K video on youtube or netflix and jaws drop to the floor... amazing... using on my 2nd Gen Chromebook Pixel, which already has the best monitor of any laptop on the market, so keeping that monitor open as a 2nd screen is a bonus... I use it for all of my messaging (facebook, hangouts, phone) while I use this beauty for everything else... waiting for the price to drop more so that I can get a 2nd one for my other house.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Bethel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!  Simply Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Simply Amazing! Great display. The screen size height is about the same as a 27" or 29" 16:9 aspect ratio monitor. I can view five Word document pages simultaneously which really helps when drafting and reviewing documents. As an add on to this review, I like this monitor so much that I bought a second one. I have two of them side-by-side connected to a single computer. While there are 4k monitors coming on the market now, at a standard desktop depth, you are quite unlikely to be even to perceive an improvement over these LG's. The resolution is extremely high, brightness is more than you need even in the brightest rooms, and adjustability to any preference.
customer_reviews.author: James Hallenbeck

customer_reviews.title: Uninterrupted work space!
customer_reviews.text: After 2-years of use as my primary/daily monitor it is still performing admirably. Only one dead pixel, but for the amount of real estate you get, it's not even noticeable. Yes there's a bit of bleed at the lower edges, but I'm not bothered by it. I use it to edit video footage via Adobe Premier and Sony Vegas... the amount of uninterrupted work space you get is now indispensable - I'll never go back to a dual monitor setup for timeline work!
customer_reviews.author: VSSP

customer_reviews.title: Works great with Mid 2012 Retina MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.text: The display is crisp and clear working at the full 3440x1440 resolution at 60 Hz refresh rate. It also works beautifully with my Mid 2012 Retina MacBook Pro. All I have to do when I come in to work in the morning is connect the power supply and Thunderbolt connector to my MacBook. The Thunderbolt connector goes to the display, and my display handles USB (2 USB2 and a single USB3 port), sound, and ethernet (thanks to a separate Thunderbolt to ethernet connector I previously bought). It does everything I wanted it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Schirmer

customer_reviews.title: starts failing after a year
customer_reviews.text: Monitor is fantastic visually but it started glitching for no reason. The screen goes black and the speakers pop really loud while using it and it's doing it more and more. I am guessing one day it will just stop working but I do my work here so it is really annoying to expect this to pop loudly and go black every 15-20 min...
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic monitor for the Mac
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is great! It easily replaces a dual display monitor setup. I can work with two screens on the same display where I used to do this across two monitors in the past, however I no longer have the break due to two monitors. Also, this works great with Mac computers thanks to the Thunderbolt 2 connector. I also use the USB ports on the back, supported over Thunderbolt, to power my keyboard, USB camera and a USB 3.0 expansion port. Very happy I bought this monitor - now going on the second month of use.
customer_reviews.author: Brady

customer_reviews.title: Great for gaming, Not in love with it for working.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, some things get confused by it's aspect ratio. In games where you have mini maps and other UI elements in the corners you really have to rely on your peripheral vision. Still - I really like it for games. I'm less enthused about it for work. I'm an art director and I thought I would like the extra space, but coming from a 30 inch Dell I really miss the extra height when I'm working.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Brudlos

customer_reviews.title: Excellent amount of screen real-estate!
customer_reviews.text: Really liking this monitor. The desktop mount is nice; I've removed it and have it attached to a swivel arm. Everything works as advertised, though the speaker is virtually useless -- it sounds pretty bad. I was hoping it would sound clearer than it does. Colors are even and balanced, blacks are very black. When in standby you can see some light bleed and uneven lighting, but that's largely irrelevant as you aren't likely going to be staring at a black standby/no-signal screen very often. Brightness and light quality is even in every day use.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Yocum

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful display
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor. Awesome video resolution with plenty of features to split the screen, etc. I purchased it to replace the need for having to use dual monitors and it works well. Mac users should note as of October 2014, this monitor does NOT work with OS X Yosemite yet. Especially with the 2012 Mac Mini (machine I am using it on). The max resolution Yosemite recognizes for it is 2056x1080. Hopefully LG or Apple fixes this issue soon.
customer_reviews.author: ZombieGoats

customer_reviews.title: Audio Controls don't work from Mac but Screen is great. :\
customer_reviews.text: This screen goes on forever. It's great. However I just learned something very annoying and that is that my Mac audio controls won't work with this monitor. :( WTF!!! It was made with a Thunderbolt connection (Yay Mac users). Oh but you can't control the audio from your Mac! It almost makes me want to return it but not quite.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hale

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor! Great Resolution
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this monitor from ey-mall (Korea) shipped to US. The monitor is great, I must admit took me a while to adjust to the resolution, 3440 x 1400, more room on the screen. I have 20/20 vision so smaller font is fine with me. Screen is bright if you want to adjust the settings to your preference. I play WOW and the game looks awesome on this monitor, would recommend LG 34UM95 to anyone that is looking for a higher resolution, using display port. Also make sure your graphic card support a higher resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: This monitor is beautiful and works and looks great
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is beautiful and works and looks great. I have it and an Apple 30in Cinema Display connected via a Sapphire graphics card on my 12-core Mac Pro. There are other monitors out there that look similar and seem to be a better deal price wise, but when you look at the resolution of those, that is where the big difference lies. I use this monitor to display multiple tracks in Ableton Live and NI Maschine. A monitor with lesser resolution would show much less track information at once.
customer_reviews.author: Karl-Franz

customer_reviews.title: Using with 13" Retina Macbook Pro Mid 2014
customer_reviews.text: This is a great alternative to the Thunderbolt display. If you want more real estate and a super simple set-up for your MacBook Pro this is a solid choice. I was up and running in minutes. It's a bit cheaper than the the current Thunderbolt, higher resolution and more space. The screen splitting software from LG is cool and easy to use. I use it for the basics (I'm not a gamer) and it is working extremely well. Highly recommend if you want a nice looking, relatively high-end display. There were a couple of comments about bad packaging - I didn't experience that. It arrived in excellent shape and ahead of the shipping estimate.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea H. Stafford

customer_reviews.title: Until OLED monitors are reasonably priced, I'm sticking with this one
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for about 9 months. There is one small issue, the speakers don't work when I use the displayport. Odd. Other than that, it's awesome, great picture, love the wide screen. IPS technology is great, just like my MacBook's display. We'll see how reliable it is since I don't plan on replacing this monitor for many, many years (until OLED monitors are reasonably priced).
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! I have a 4 year old GTX 550 ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! I have a 4 year old GTX 550 Ti video card displaying native resolution via display cable. Game test, ran Titan Fall at full res, a little bit choppy, but soooo beautiful. So need more power for gaming at full res (gtx960 going in), otherwise, this card powers this monitor just fine. Running font scaling at 115% - which is just a per person eyesight thing. Only adjustment physically is tilt forward/back, else no real height adjustment short of the stand has two mounting spots.
customer_reviews.author: Burtacus

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not working already.
customer_reviews.text: Well it's a nice monitor, but it arrived with only 1 hdmi port working, the dv, thunderbolt, and hdmi 2 port all do not work. I'd send it back, but have to pay freight which is crazy on something that just came in yesterday. Now I have a technician coming out in 3 days to look at it, and if broken will take for repair so I'll have a brand new monitor in for repair for who knows how long. Very displeased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor! Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor! Would buy again. I've attached a screen capture of my desktop. Don't know if it will be helpful or not given what you'll be viewing it on but it might be helpful to some.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Plant Eater that Loves Bacon

customer_reviews.title: I'm a pretty busy developer
customer_reviews.text: The monitor is absolutely incredible. I'm a pretty busy developer, often working on 3-4 projects at any given time, so the extra real estate provided here really helps me get work done more efficiently. Combine this with a good window manager (I use Moom), and you're got yourself an incredible workstation with a single external monitor. The only drawback I have is that sometimes the right half of the monitor will start displaying what looks like white noise, but it's colored (rainbow noise?) I just unplug the monitor and plug it back in when this happens, but if it continues, I will likely need to get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: eric olszewski

customer_reviews.title: Holy crap - this is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing display. Formerly with a 25" monitor I was always shuffling windows to be able to see everything. So far, it's been difficult to actually fill up all this screen space. The display at 3440x1400 is super crisp. Speakers are so-so, but then again I'm comparing it to my Bose speakers, which really isn't fair. The audio is clear enough that a person could take a call on it without any difficulty. I wouldn't listen to music on them, though.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin King

customer_reviews.title: Will Replace All of Our Apple 27" Monitors with this Monitor!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this monitor. Replaced my Apple 27" monitor that died a horrible fitful death. Great brightness and my Macbook pro 2015 drives it perfectly via thunderbolt. I also have a mac mini plugged into the hdmi slot and can switch between them but it's not convenient. Totally recommend it. Wish there was one more usb port but I really can't knock it because the picture is so shockingly beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Emmett Chadwick Bearden

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY LG PRODUCTS - THEY DON'T STAND BEHIND THEIR PRODUCTS
customer_reviews.text: The monitor developed a problem with its electronics and displayed gold and white dots along with 'dancing ' blue, white and gray lines on the left half of the screen. I was told there was a one year warranty and that I could have on out of warranty service for $450.00. The person quoting the 'policy' was polite but apathetic about the fact that we had paid $900 for a product that stopped working. My Samsung monitor that I purchase in 1999 still works like the day I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love
customer_reviews.text: Love! Love! Love! Sadly, I am on a computer more than I'm not and I do a lot of comparison between documents. This monitor allows me to dock several across and easily drop information between them, I also pop up the font size to save my eyes, the colors are gorgeous and I just can't say enough great things about it. You won't be disappointed This is a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful monitor, horrible configuration software
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful monitor, horrible configuration software. I cannot express in words how awesome this monitor looks, especially with a high-end PC running a game. Downsides: After almost a year, the color sync still crashes or won't recognize the monitor. No updates, even after I've contacted LG many times.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: gaming heaven ...
customer_reviews.text: By far the coolest thing I've added for gaming. I'm running a r9 295x2 and throwing games up in 1440 ... change the FOV from 70ish to 90 ... and wow instant immersion ... I mean titan fall with a wide field of view, is just plain epic. I am very glad I chose this over cheaper 4k ... sure more resolution ... but in our desktop day and age thats no where near as fun as wide resolution with wide field of view.
customer_reviews.author: ManiacMagic

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go back to 16:9
customer_reviews.text: It’s a necessity for working in any program with a timeline. The best monitor I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Merf

customer_reviews.title: Windows driver makes screen flicker
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint that I have with this monitor is that it doesn't play nice with Windows 10, Windows will automatically install its own drivers as generic plug and play, which is fine I guess if you're using HDMI cables or DisplayPort 1.1. So when using DisplayPort 1.2 the screen flickers occasionally even when using latest video card drivers. My solution was to manually install the drivers that lg provides and that solved my screen flickering problem
customer_reviews.author: Miguel A Joseph Sr

customer_reviews.title: Very good monitor. My productivity increased a lot by using ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good monitor. My productivity increased a lot by using this monitor to have multiple applications on the same screen. No more dealing with bezels using multiple monitors. Screen is beautiful. Not a hardcore gamer, a lot of games are not optimized to fit ultrawide monitors such as this one. One complaint is the seemingly flimsy stand.
customer_reviews.author: BakaQQ

customer_reviews.title: I loved the monitor for five months
customer_reviews.text: I loved the monitor for five months, until one day I work appeared a black slash of 1mm from top to bottom and do not know how to solve.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Great except for sound control.
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor, but I don't like the sound control. I'm attached via HDMI, and there is no volume control to use from my computer. Also, no button on the monitor. You have to go through a series of menus just to adjust the volume 😡. But the picture is gorgeous, and otherwise it works well with my MacBook Pro Air.
customer_reviews.author: CS Dee

customer_reviews.title: Words can't describe how nice this monitor is
customer_reviews.text: Words can't describe how nice this monitor is. Plenty of room for multiple applications. World of Warcraft, Tomb Raider, and Portal 1 and 2 look stunning at native resolution. Once you use this you will never, ever go back to a normal monitor. With the external powerbrick it runs cool. The only con is lack of height adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Lise

customer_reviews.title: Mac Book Pro works 100%
customer_reviews.text: I have a new Mac Book Pro and to my delight after hooking up this beautiful screen, with the thunderbolt connection, it was everything I read about, but one thing, it does sleep and weak up just fine when I tap on the keyboard I plugged in. I can't tell you how good it feels to work on one big screen and not two and the resolution does make a difference. Someone said, this monitor is perfection, for me it is and its not about the stand.
customer_reviews.author: Jean M.

customer_reviews.title: Dream monitor
customer_reviews.text: I'll keep it short. It's worth the premium price. I use it for work and pleasure and it's perfect for both. I decided this monitor over 4K and I do not regret it one bit. To many things to like about it to write it all down here, and I have yet to find anything that bothers me. Super happy with my purchase and would highly recommend this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely gorgeous in both form and function. Haven't used ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous in both form and function. Haven't used it enough to assess the backlight bleed issues stated by others here. BUT one important detail to take note of is this...can your current graphics card handle the 3440 x 1440 resolution? Most stock cards cannot and in fact even some low to mid range upgrade cards do not support that resolution either.
customer_reviews.author: Unimproved Ends

customer_reviews.title: Very good big monitor for office use
customer_reviews.text: Good resolution, lots of real estate to work on. As advertised. Only downside is the interface is a bit clunky. Shouldn't have to push joystick multiple times to turn it off. Would like a simple power button.
customer_reviews.author: DavidH

customer_reviews.title: One of the best monitors!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best monitors i've used and I've used quite a few monitors (Asus PB278Q,Asus PB287Q, Asus PA248Q, Benq RL24HT, BenQ XL2420Z).LG Includes a Display Port Cable, HDMI Cable, and DVI Cable in the box, you will also need a USB A to B cable to use the USB hub on the back of the monitor. This monitor is a joy to use still and is absolutely gorgeous,watching movies is unbelievable, and gaming is incredibly immersive without bezels of a multi monitor setup.
customer_reviews.author: Gum Ng

customer_reviews.title: This monitor is absolutely beautiful. I have used it so far for photography ...
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is astonishing. From the reviews I was worried that I was going to get it and have some of the issues that others have complained about as in the back light bleed. This monitor is absolutely beautiful. I have used it so far for photography and some games. Having 2-3 or even 4 windows opened side by side without having to look between 2 monitors is amazing. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Willoughby

customer_reviews.title: Love this monitor
customer_reviews.text: Love this monitor. Had one stuck pixel, but the pixel density is so high it's almost impossible to see. I have very minor backlight bleeding, but it's rarely noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: ace2904

customer_reviews.title: this monitor is amazing. The quality is great and the split screen ...
customer_reviews.text: After watching a lot of reviews of this product on YouTube, this monitor is amazing. The quality is great and the split screen feature is great for productivity. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: ryan johnitty

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful, if you can get past the light bleed issue
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, packed full of features. Came with HDMI and displayport cable. Requires a specific USB cable to connect to computer for full feature use. Reason for the 3/5* is the good awful light bleed.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Cobb

customer_reviews.title: real nice and super wide plus 3440x1440p makes it to where ...
customer_reviews.text: real nice and super wide plus 3440x1440p makes it to where you dont even need fxaa on games plus its and ips panel the only complaint id have is that theres not a 144hz version yet and the software make my computer lock up somtetime but might be an issue on my side other then that its perfect
customer_reviews.author: jesse anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor until the joystick breaks
customer_reviews.text: Lasted me about 2 years before the joystick button broke. Now I can no longer change any settings or turn it on and off. Poor design having a plastic joystick to control the thing IMO.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFan123

customer_reviews.title: screen works, but as for "best experience" don't plan ...
customer_reviews.text: screen works, but as for "best experience" don't plan on any games running natively with this format of screen... it said it would, video card and PC can handle it but it just didn't work, had to look up online for fixes... not worth that tiny bit of hassle
customer_reviews.author: TheBradley

customer_reviews.title: Love this monitor
customer_reviews.text: Love this monitor!!! I can fit two computers on this one at the same time. Well made with brilliant colors and luminosity. The size is not intimidating yet just the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Cori

customer_reviews.title: Horrible customer service and no warranty coverage!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor but if you need it serviced under the warranty good luck!!! I have never experienced such horrible and incompetent customer service both from the LG repair customer service folks and the repair center. I had problems with mine a month after buying and it is now almost a year and still can't get them to even look at it. It say at their recommended repair center for months while I got the run around and lies from both ends. I finally just picked it up and now trying to go through corporate to get it resolved. I will never ever buy another LG product ever!!!
customer_reviews.author: hugscot

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is good but not perfect, should buy the Acer 38 in curved monitor.
customer_reviews.author: hsin yu wang

customer_reviews.title: Excelllent 21:9 Monitor. Stick with the flat screen instead of following the curved hype!
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor! Upgraded from 29" LG ultra wide. Couldn't have made a better decision. If I could rewind time, I would have just waited and saved the money I spent on buying two 29" ultra-wides and just bought this single screen.
customer_reviews.author: boomh

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was fine, light bleed seems non-existent
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about some of the other reviews, but suspect that they concerned early problems that have since been resolved. Packaging was fine, light bleed seems non-existent. The picture is amazingly sharp and clean. I love this monitor!
customer_reviews.author: Corvid

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Stunning. Beautiful. You'll never go back to two screens again. Speakers are not bad. I think it would be awesome if this monitor supported Displayport 1.3. But other than that I think its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Jopling

customer_reviews.title: I have two of this one and I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: This is the one to buy if you do video editing and picture retouching... is IPS and has a lot of room for multiple windows because of its rectangular shape, I have two of this one and I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Yerry Batista

customer_reviews.title: Total Geek-Gasm
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a BEAST - both in size and in capability!! Have replaced a rig with 2-3 separate monitors with this ONE.... get it for the loved-geek in your life... they will be happy!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher S Judd

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor, not sure about the AC Adaptor?
customer_reviews.text: I would give 4-5 stars if the AC Adaptor wasn't so noisy. There is a loud crackling or buzzing sound coming from the adaptor when the monitor is on and receiving signal. The adaptor is quiet when monitor is powered on, but no signal. There may be something wrong with it, but I can't find any information regarding issues with this adaptor. If I can get a replacement, this would be an excellent monitor. Works great with 2015 MacBook Pro Retina using Thunderbolt or HDMI.
customer_reviews.author: PCC

customer_reviews.title: Best Gaming Experience
customer_reviews.text: Best Gaming Experience.....EVER! I now feel like playing on anything less that ultrawide 1440 just isn't worth it. It has ruined me, but its oh so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Forrestapi

customer_reviews.title: It's a pretty good product
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty good product. My reason for having it was for the spilt screen features. As a designer, it really helps with the multiple screens skipping and jumping from screen to screen accessibility truly helps. Screen sharpness is very good. I have my MacBook Pro 13' connected to the screen and connected with a thunderbolt cable. When my MacBook is open the resolution of the screen is not as sharp. I have to close my MacBook to get the full resolution of the monitor.
customer_reviews.author: jayp

customer_reviews.title: Ultra wide is SO GOOD!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this (actually 2) to game on. I'm obsessed. I will never go back to a normal monitor again. Ultra wide is SO GOOD!!! In every game I use! This monitor is high quality, good features, perfect picture, only thing missing is that it's not 4k but honestly, I don't care. Get it. Get it. Get it.
customer_reviews.author: Unicorn Ink

customer_reviews.title: amazing resolution. this monitor works great for web development ...
customer_reviews.text: amazing resolution. this monitor works great for web development as I can have a full browser window open side by side with my text editor. great for gaming too. I use a 24inch dell next to this for another browser window, email, or terminal. I love that with this monitor i don't have to move windows around. there is so much real estate you can setup everything how you like and leave it.
customer_reviews.author: evangelisto

customer_reviews.title: If you are on the fence just add it to your cart...You will thank me later
customer_reviews.text: For a monitor this is just flat out amazing. It is not 4K but honestly I do not even care. The quality, build, and design of this monitor makes it a welcome addition to my desk and 21.5 inch iMac. It has THUNDERBOLT! Not many monitors do and with this port you get beautiful resolution. Also this is a great price and Amazon Prime got it to my door in two days!
customer_reviews.author: Gadgetman08

customer_reviews.title: Sooo amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Most beautiful monitor I have every owned. Increased my work productivity while simplifying and streamlining my workspace. Its just.....fantastic, freaking fantastic. So damn nice and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: So far we are very happy with the monitor
customer_reviews.text: So far we are very happy with the monitor, it make multi tasking a great experience. I have never used on before so this make working with multiple pages very easy to do, with plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: JULIE

customer_reviews.title: GREAT MONITOR!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my Macbook Pro Retina! It's basically plug n play with a few minor setup items. I could not be happier with this monitor and it's very high quality!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Monitor. 21:9 IPS 34in. Ever thing you need, Unless you want g-sync and 100Hz. Still good for gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Plummer

customer_reviews.title: This monitor is nearly as good as I​ had hoped
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is nearly as good as I​ had hoped, the pixel pitch is excellent, not 4k but really close to indistinguishable in most scenarios. The colors are the only thing that didn't quite blow me away. I had an LED backlight LCD tv that I used before as a monitor and the colors here are marginally better, but the features set and pixel density are excellent, the contrast is notably better too. I will attach some pics of the light bleed, it is as bad as people say but unless you're looking for perfect black with no lights on its unnoticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Part49

customer_reviews.title: Nice monitor
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is awesome it could be cheaper and the refresh rate is not very good but the color is awesome
customer_reviews.author: yihong

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoy this monitor more than I thought I would
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy this monitor more than I thought I would. I typically use two 27" IPS monitors side by side, now I'd much rather use my 34" LG, it's easier on my neck and 34" is about the limit I'd every want width wise on a monitor. Great buy, and an added bonus is the dock on the rear of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Really good super HD monitor for under a $1000, or those not ready for 5k
customer_reviews.text: Got this as an upgrade to my 27" apple display for Adobe illustrator and photoshop work primarily. Definitely feels like an upgrade. Much bigger. Much higher resolution. Using it with a 2014 Mac pro, thunderbolt connection at 3440 x 1440 / 60 hertz. USB ports pass through flawlessly and seem pretty high powered. HDMI for PS4 / Blu ray looks really good as well. You can display 2 sources at one time which is kinda cool. I'm super happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dab Marino

customer_reviews.title: It is beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: This is my editing screen. I edit on a daily basis with FCPX. It is beautiful. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: bruce maniscalco

customer_reviews.title: Have it through my docking station for my surface book and it works great. The split screen function is awesome for multiple ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my dual screen setup and wanted higher resolution. Have it through my docking station for my surface book and it works great. The split screen function is awesome for multiple windows at once.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Masciangelo

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor for the money. I have it wall mounted in my workout room. Works and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is amazing, the long length is great for video editing timelines, photo editing, and more.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron G

customer_reviews.title: This display is awesome, had it for a couple months now
customer_reviews.text: This display is awesome, had it for a couple months now, and it displays color beautifully. Works great with Mac via thunderbolt if you get the thunderbolt edition. I plugged in an additional thunderbolt display to it by daisy chain.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: works great and no lightbleeds
customer_reviews.text: Hey everyone, eve received the monitor today and its sexy, works great and no lightbleeds :D i only have one issue and its No sound!! am using a Quadro k4200 displayport the image is great but no sound if anyone knows how to fix this please help! Thank you god bless!
customer_reviews.author: Ali Gari

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor so much, I'm considering buying a second for my desk at work.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisM

customer_reviews.title: Best monitor I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is wow what a monitor. This thing is so damn big. I don't know what to say. Almost 2 months no issues. Wow buy this damn thing
customer_reviews.author: Dean Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Great real estate
customer_reviews.text: I now have two of these. If you have a Mac, make sure you get the one that is Thunderbolt compatible, if you Mac has Thunderbolt. Great real estate, great picture!
customer_reviews.author: Mack W.

customer_reviews.title: Love having full frame video
customer_reviews.text: It's gorgeous. Love having full frame video, wide angle gaming and accurate coloring, typically lacking on storefront units
customer_reviews.author: Soup

customer_reviews.title: The monitor that launched the age of ultra-wide.
customer_reviews.text: Best monitor I've ever owned. I'm officially addicted to IPS screens now. I was pleasantly surprised to find that almost all my new and old PC games are compatible with this resolution. Not counting Skyrim. If you plan to use it for gaming, don't cheap out on your card. You don't need an overclocked rig with multiple graphics cards, but you should at least get a GTX680 or faster. If you haven't bought this monitor yet, and you are reading reviews. Go buy LG's curved version of this screen!
customer_reviews.author: Kamui Shirou

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly with my early 2013 Macbook Pro retina with thunderbolt2 cable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to supplement my early 2013 Macbook Pro with retina display and it works beautifully with a thunderbolt2 cable. I am even able to connect usb3 and thunderbolt peripherals to this monitor and it works seamlessly. Great product. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Chakola

customer_reviews.title: Best display i have ever used (working as analytic)
customer_reviews.text: Best display i have ever used (working as analytic). If u use this for mac, I strongly recommend to use Divy window management.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, but beware of the low refresh rate (60 hz).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! best screen I have owned and I use multiple screens regularly. Have a few of these togeteher.
customer_reviews.author: levy17007

customer_reviews.title: Works great, like having three standard monitors all in one
customer_reviews.text: Works great, like having three standard monitors all in one. Easy to connect two computers to and have them both on the screen at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Gunther

customer_reviews.title: this is an excellent ultra HD video monitor
customer_reviews.text: this is an excellent ultra HD video monitor. It comes with all the different cables needed to hook it up to any advanced gaming computer.
customer_reviews.author: Chorefamily

customer_reviews.title: This monitor is awesome!! One shortfall is when watching DVD/Blu Rays ...
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is awesome!! One shortfall is when watching DVD/Blu Rays from your computer... it will not stretch to fill up the screen. So sad :(
customer_reviews.author: V. Lawn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome monitor! I love the ultra wide format and ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome monitor! I love the ultra wide format and the color reproduction is fantastic. Mine doesn't have any of the light leakage others reported on early versions either.
customer_reviews.author: woodie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Use it with my Mac Book Pro 2013 ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Use it with my Mac Book Pro 2013 for professional work. Resolution is excellent. Easy to configure. Provides lots of screen real estate for my work. Fonts are all legible. No shadows or bad corners. I have a 4K 28 inch from Monoprice that was cheaper but the difference is pronounced. Wish I had bought two of these. I
customer_reviews.author: JJD

customer_reviews.title: Great screen. I'm not entirely sure why the built ...
customer_reviews.text: Great screen. I'm not entirely sure why the built in USB hub needs to sleep when the monitor sleeps -- seems like a very strange oversight.
customer_reviews.author: detansinn

customer_reviews.title: great monitor. love the ability to run two computers ...
customer_reviews.text: great monitor. love the ability to run two computers into it.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Rountree

customer_reviews.title: Amazing monitor.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing monitor. Works flawlessly with a macbook over thunderbolt. I will be getting another one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Gilsenan

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor and hit the timing just right to get ...
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor and hit the timing just right to get a great price. Tried to buy two more for the office but price spiked up. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Wealth Coach

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful images and options
customer_reviews.text: Needed to buy a more powerful video card which I wasn't expecting.. But worth it. Beautiful images and options
customer_reviews.author: Elvis

customer_reviews.title: This is an absolutely amazing monitor. I do have a very minor light ...
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? This is an absolutely amazing monitor. I do have a very minor light bleeding issue in the top right side of the screen but it's barely noticeable and I can't really notice it while using the monitor. It took a few hours to adapt to my wall of pixels but I'm in love with this display.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: WOW! Mac Friendly, thunderbolt ready, Ultra QHD (3440x1440)
customer_reviews.text: WOW! Mac Friendly, thunderbolt ready, UNBELIEVABLE. My new MacBook Air powers this thing flawlessly with one thunderbolt cable. My colleague has the $1000 thunderbolt display and is quite jealous of my 34 inches of Ultra QHD (3440x1440) resolution compared to his tiny 27 2560x1440. This monitor just rocks!
customer_reviews.author: T. Noyes

customer_reviews.title: Display is great from quality standpoint - without flaw
customer_reviews.text: Display is great from quality standpoint - without flaw. I'm giving four stars since I connect with Thunderbolt on my mac and none of the mac keyboard controls work for the monitor, volume and dimming do not function; which is pretty annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Jason R

product_meta.title: LG Electronics UM95 34UM95-P 34-Inch Screen LED-Lit Monitor
feature_bullets: UltraWide format provides additional real estate for you to multitask or watch multiple inputs at once.
Ultra QHD (3440x1440) resolution provides the additional resolution you have been looking for.
Dual-link fuctionality allows you to view two separate inputs at the same time.
HDMI, Display Port, USB 3.0, and Thunderbolt 2 inputs allow you to connect to all your devices.
The gorgeous Cinema Screen design with integrated 7W speakers look stunning on or off.
